an10.102:4.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā tisso vijjā paripūrenti.
an10.102:4.3: Satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
an10.102:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā tisso vijjā paripūrenti.
an10.102:4.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
an10.102:4.7: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo … pe …
an10.102:4.8: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an10.102:4.13: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā imā tisso vijjā paripūrentī”ti.
